name: RI_1_1_1_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Originate_Retain_Event
title: RI.1.1.1.1 Evidence of Record Entry Originate/Retain Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Originate/Retain Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Originate/Retain Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when a Record Entry is originated and retained.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is originated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the individual(s) who performed the Action documented in Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user who entered/authored Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which originated Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#07
statement.requirement: IF the source of Record Entry content is a device, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the device.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the Action as evidenced by Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., originate/retain).

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of Action occurrence as evidenced by Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is originated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the duration of the Action evidenced by Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#13
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the physical location of the Action evidenced by Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#14
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is originated.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#15
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for the Action evidenced by Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#16
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for originating Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.1.1#17
statement.requirement: IF Record Entry content includes templates (boilerplate information) or copied (duplicated) information, THEN the system SHOULD capture the source of such content.
